data.lyric:
[ti:come out and play]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:come out and play]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]come out and play - Billie Eilish
[00:02.70]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:05.41]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:08.12]Produced by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:10.83]Hmm hmm
[00:14.91]Wake up and smell the coffee
[00:17.98]Is your cup half full or empty
[00:21.37]When we talk you say it softly
[00:24.75]But I love it when you're awfully quiet quiet
[00:41.32]You see a piece of paper
[00:44.71]Could be a little greater
[00:47.92]Show me what you could make her
[00:51.17]You'll never know until you try it
[00:59.14]You don't have to keep it quiet
[01:07.49]And I know it makes you nervous
[01:13.26]But I promise you it's worth it
[01:21.28]To show 'em everything you kept inside
[01:27.28]Don't hide don't hide
[01:40.52]Too shy to say but I hope you stay
[01:47.13]Don't hide away
[01:53.44]Come out and play
[02:00.69]Look up out of your window
[02:04.02]See snow won't let it in though
[02:07.44]Leave home feel the wind blow
[02:10.56]'Cause it's colder here inside in silence
[02:18.53]You don't have to keep it quiet
[02:26.75]Yeah I know it makes you nervous
[02:32.52]But I promise you it's worth it
[02:40.72]To show 'em everything you kept inside
[02:46.69]Don't hide don't hide
[02:59.90]Too shy to say but I hope you stay
[03:06.47]Don't hide away
[03:12.79]Come out and play
data.trans:
[ti:come out and play]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:come out and play]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.70]//
[00:05.41]//
[00:08.12]//
[00:10.83]//
[00:14.91]醒一醒 闻一闻咖啡
[00:17.98]你觉得这杯咖啡半满还是半空的呢
[00:21.37]当我们交谈的时候 你的话语温柔细腻
[00:24.75]但我喜欢你寂然无声的时候
[00:41.32]你看 这不过是一张纸
[00:44.71]但你可以让它色彩缤纷
[00:47.92]让我看看你可以创作出什么作品
[00:51.17]不试试 你怎么知道自己有多大能耐
[00:59.14]你不必缄默不语
[01:07.49]我知道迈出这一步让你很紧张
[01:13.26]但我保证 这绝对值得
[01:21.28]向世人展示你内心深处的一切吧
[01:27.28]不要隐藏 不要隐藏
[01:40.52]你害羞得无法开口 但我希望你坚持下去
[01:47.13]不要逃避
[01:53.44]放开自己 加入我们吧
[02:00.69]抬头看看窗外
[02:04.02]看看飞舞的雪花 但它们无法进来
[02:07.44]走出温暖的家 去感受冬日的寒风吧
[02:10.56]因为寂然无声才是真正的寒冷
[02:18.53]你不必缄默不语
[02:26.75]我知道迈出这一步让你很紧张
[02:32.52]但我保证 这绝对值得
[02:40.72]向世人展示你内心深处的一切吧
[02:46.69]不要隐藏 不要隐藏
[02:59.90]你害羞得无法开口 但我希望你坚持下去
[03:06.47]不要逃避
[03:12.79]放开自己 加入我们吧
